description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Tempest Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Tempest Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGustOfWind]{Gust of Wind}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShatter000]{Shatter}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCallLightn]{Call Lightning}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleetStorm]{Sleet Storm}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWin]{Control Winds}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}
